==RADIO LINK: Parallax 433 MHz RF Receiver\Transmitter==
<img src="http://www.parallaxdirect.com/cart/images/products/detail_213_27981-M.jpg" align="right">
<img style="-webkit-user-select: none" src="http://www.parallaxdirect.com/cart/images/products/detail_215_27980-M.jpg" align="right">
  * Power: 5V +/-10%
  * Current: ~10 mA normal operation & ~3mA during power down
  * Data Rate: 12,000 - 19.2 K baud (controller dependent)
  * Frequency: 433.92 Mhz (UHF)
  * Transmission 500 ft+, based on environment conditions.
